titleInfo.title: WSM Grand Ole Opry star Cowboy Copas at the Broadway Drive-In Theaters

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the WSM Grand Ole Opry star Cowboy Copas with Oklahoma Cowboys, Cathy Copas, Randy Hughes, and Dale Potter at the Broadway Drive-In theater on June 15. Poster features a metal photoplate of Cowboy Copas.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
